page.title: 06FARMING 2 -SOUTH OF BARRHEAD
page.content: { {NETHERTON & DYKE}farms which are typical of the area are run as a single unit and need the following {MACHINERY:- } { {Combine harvester}-cuts, separates grain, straw ejected ready for baler. {Forage harvester}-cuts & lifts wet grass for silage. { {Tractors}-pull other implements. {Baler}-bales hay and straw.{ {Muckraker}-gathers muck in heaps. {Mechanical shovel}- lifting muck. {Muck spreader}-spreads muck on fields. {Fertiliser spreader}-chemical. {Trailer}-carries bales, crops & feed. {Plough}-Spring ploughing. {Harrow}-makes tilth for sowing. {Seed sower}- sows barley and grass. {Turnip planter}-sows turnip seed. {Cattle float}-takes cattle to market.
